header.gameNote: OUTRIGGER RAINBOW CLASSIC AT HONOLULU HI

article.headline: Charlotte 74, Valparaiso 62
article.story: HONOLULU (AP) -- DeAngelo Alexander scored 24 points and Charlotte held off Valparaiso for a 74-62 win in the Rainbow Classic consolation game on Friday. E.J. Drayton added 12 points for the 49ers (4-6) and Leemire Goldwire had 11 and Courtney Williams added 10. Brandon McPherson led Valparaiso (3-8) with 24 points and Samuel Haanpaa added 21. McPherson's floater from six feet with seconds left sent the teams into halftime tied at 34. However, Valparaiso shot just 30 percent from the field in the second half and were outscored 40-28 in the final 20 minutes. The 49ers snapped a two-game skid and will play Wyoming in the fifth-place game Saturday. The Crusaders dropped their eighth consecutive game -- their longest such streak in 15 seasons -- and will meet San Francisco is the seventh-place game.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
